title: Evo Online is Cancelled - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.03.20
description:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
We’re back streaming Predator Hunting Grounds! 3-5 pm pacific time on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:07 - Evo has been cancelled -  Jon Porter @ The Verge
00:17:50 - Ubisoft has announced their new Battle Royale game, Hyper Scape - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:21:50 - Ubisoft is restructuring its Editorial Team - Rebekah Valentine @ GiBiz
00:30:41 - Other publishers are considering raising game prices for PS5 and Xbox Series X - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:36:00 - Are the economics of a game's target price more important to the industry than just the bottom line? - Best Friends Q:Harvi Coline
00:47:00 - Popular Twitch Streamer, Byron ‘Reckful’ Bernstein, Dies at 31 - Ellise Shafer @ Variety
00:49:30 - My Friend Pedro is getting a tv adaptation - Rebekah Valentine
00:52:40 - We might’ve been spot on with Giancarlo Esposito being the next Far Cry Villain - Sherif Saed @ VG247
00:55:10 -  Brooklinen
00:57:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:59:00 - Now that we're a good way through the E3 replacement summer I'm curious how the numerous showcases affected outlets like Kinda Funny. Has more opportunities for impressions, reactions and spread out news had a noticeable effect on views or traffic for Kinda Funny over previous years? - Dale
01:05:50 - Squad Up:Scott Butterworth(PC- Steam) - scottymcbutters
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Tim and Imran
Tuesday: Blessing and Imran
Wednesday: Greg and Gary
Thursday: Greg and Blessing
Friday: Blessing and Greg
